name: Earthing up
description: breaking of ridges and converting them into furrows and furrows into ridges

name: Hoeing
description: When the crop is not germinated due to rainfall and to break the hard crust of soil

name: Gap filing
description: 3 budded setts are used to plant in the end to end and the furrow is covered by 5-7 cm of soil and field is leveled by planking

name: De-Trashing
description: Removal of some of the older leaves from cane crop is known as detrashing and it is done to avoid attack of insect pests
